name: Block Game Match Legend
description:
This is a classic yet innovative game!
As long as you tap sideways or vertically and connected into a line can be eliminated and got scores
Game interface is very friendly and simple to use for all users of all ages.
Download our classic blocks game and beware it‘s can cause a Block Game Match, have fun and enjoy yourself!
Feature:
-Saving game when quit by using power off button
-Online ranking system
-Smoothy effect
-Sharing the screen when click button sharing
